channel.title: Making player temporary not drop
channel.description: Ok so I'm trying to make a player not be able to drop certain items in a certain area, any ideas? I've searched google mopar bing yahoo ect.... and nothing, nothing not even a little hint so, help? I have a Pi source BTW (Project Insanity)
